caseTitle: Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif v. Imran Ahmed Khan Niazi
tagline: The Court in the review petitions against the judgment, whereby the Prime Minister was disqualified and the National Accountability Bureau was directed to file references against him and his children before the Accountability Court, rejects the argument that the salary even if agreed upon under the employment contract would not be an asset if not withdrawn and dismisses the petitions.
